name: Impulsion
description:
Make your way through 25 levels of increasing difficulty by manipulating physics to your advantage, shooting force fields to slow down or speed yourself up and the environment!

Tired of easy games? Hop into the Competitive and Speedrun modes to climb the leaderboards! Challenge your friends, online players and yourself! Be prepared... It's not going to be easy.KEY FEATURES
  • Fast-paced platformer in first-person experience!
  • Challenging levels providing hours of gameplay
  • Story Mode with an intriguing science-fiction story filled with funny dialogues
  • Competitive Mode with Steam leaderboards to challenge the world ...and your friends
  • Speedrun Mode with an in-game timer for players looking for the hardest of challenges!
